SymbolDef.descr: FlightSim container property, type and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: SpeedKnots
PropertyDef.descr: Speed measured in knots.

PropertyDef.name: EngineStarted
PropertyDef.descr: Engine(s) on.

PropertyDef.name: WrapWaypoints
PropertyDef.descr: Travel in a loop or stop at end of path?

PropertyDef.name: CurrentWaypoint
PropertyDef.descr: Index of the waypoint we are currently tracking.

PropertyDef.name: BackupToFirst
PropertyDef.descr: Do we drive in reverse to the first waypoint?

PropertyDef.name: LineWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Width of the drawn line.

PropertyDef.name: LineHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Height of the drawn line.

PropertyDef.name: GroundCruiseSpeed
PropertyDef.descr: Default speed in knots for this pilot

PropertyDef.name: GroundTurnSpeed
PropertyDef.descr: AI Pilot slows to this speed in knots when making sharp turns

PropertyDef.name: GroundTurnTime
PropertyDef.descr: AI Pilot attempts to make 90 degree turns in this amount of time (seconds).

PropertyDef.name: AccelKnots
PropertyDef.descr: Acceleration in knots per second

PropertyDef.name: InitialSpeed
PropertyDef.descr: Initial speed in knots per second

PropertyDef.name: SnapOrientationToFaceWaypointMode
PropertyDef.descr: Determine how the controller's orientation should change when navigating to new waypoints.

PropertyDef.name: RequestedDuration
PropertyDef.descr: Duration in seconds given to a waypoint controller to reach the waypoint. Only placement object controllers honor this request.

PropertyDef.name: RequestedDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance in meters given from a waypoint in which the controller considers the waypoint reached. This will override the controllers internal logic.

PropertyDef.name: PercentSegmentForSpeedTransition
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of current segment at which requested airspeed is targeted. The new target airspeed is linearly interpolated from the previous waypoint up to this point. (0.0 - 1.0)

PropertyDef.name: PercentSegmentForAltitudeTransition
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of current segment at which requested altitude is targeted. The new target altitude is linearly interpolated from the previous waypoint up to this point. (0.0 - 1.0)

PropertyDef.name: YieldToUser
PropertyDef.descr: Determine whether to stop if the user is in front of us.

PropertyDef.name: CustomValue
PropertyDef.descr: This field is only used by an external sim.

PropertyDef.name: AIBehaviorActivated
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the selected behavior is activated.

PropertyDef.name: AIBehaviorActivatedTime
PropertyDef.descr: The sim time when the behavior was activated.

PropertyDef.name: BehaviorGUID
PropertyDef.descr: Used to select and activate a specific AIBehavior

PropertyDef.name: OffsetPosition
PropertyDef.descr: The offset from the leader the AI should follow in feet.

PropertyDef.name: FireRadiusMinFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum radius that AI will fire upon acquired targets. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: FireRadiusMaxFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum radius that AI will fire upon acquired targets. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: FireFOVDegrees
PropertyDef.descr: In degrees, the angle sweep that allows the AI to attack the selected target.

PropertyDef.name: WeaponTitle
PropertyDef.descr: The title of the weapon the AI should attack with.

PropertyDef.name: WeaponType
PropertyDef.descr: The type of the weapon the AI should attack with.

PropertyDef.name: GunTitle
PropertyDef.descr: The object title of the gun the AI should attack with.

PropertyDef.name: GunType
PropertyDef.descr: The type of the gun the AI should attack with.

PropertyDef.name: AttackDelaySeconds
PropertyDef.descr: The amount of time an AI will wait before attacking again.

PropertyDef.name: GunBurstDurationSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: How long in seconds the AI will fire a gun.

PropertyDef.name: InvestigateRadiusFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Radius that AI will look for pursuable objects. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: MaxPursuitDurationSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: The max amount of time an object will be pursued outside the investigate radius.

PropertyDef.name: InterceptGroundObjects
PropertyDef.descr: Should AI object move toward the surface when pursuing ground targets.

PropertyDef.name: PatrolOriginLLA
PropertyDef.descr: The LLA that the AI should patrol around.

PropertyDef.name: PatrolRadiusFeet
PropertyDef.descr: The radius that the AI should patrol around. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: BehaviorStartTime
PropertyDef.descr: The time that this AIBehavior should be triggered.

PropertyDef.name: SupportLLA
PropertyDef.descr: The LLA that the AI should be supporting.

PropertyDef.name: SearchRadiusFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum radius the AI will enter the search state. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: SearchFOVDegrees
PropertyDef.descr: In degrees, the angle sweep the AI the search state.

PropertyDef.name: TrackRadiusFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum radius the AI will track a target. Default units are in feet.

PropertyDef.name: TrackFOVDegrees
PropertyDef.descr: In degrees, the angle sweep that allows the valid assignment of an enemy as a target.

PropertyDef.name: LabelMode
PropertyDef.descr: Label display mode

PropertyDef.name: IdentificationNumber
PropertyDef.descr: Aircraft tail/registration number

PropertyDef.name: IdentificationNumberFont
PropertyDef.descr: Font used for identification number

PropertyDef.name: IdentificationNumberColor
PropertyDef.descr: Color used for identification number

PropertyDef.name: ContainerID
PropertyDef.descr: Used to map serialized container info in .xml to sim info in .flt

PropertyDef.name: OnPlatformHeight
PropertyDef.descr: The height of the object when placed on top of a platform.

PropertyDef.name: TrafficDBFile
PropertyDef.descr: File name of traffic database, if any, that generated this container

PropertyDef.name: TrafficDBKey
PropertyDef.descr: Instance key of the traffic database entry, if any, that generated this container

PropertyDef.name: RunwayHeading
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Heading in degrees

PropertyDef.name: InitialFlaps
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum flaps position to use during landing

PropertyDef.name: ThresholdLLA
PropertyDef.descr: LLA of point where we want to touch down

PropertyDef.name: RunwayLength
PropertyDef.descr: Length of Runway in Nautical Miles

PropertyDef.name: RunwayAlt
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Altitude in feet MSL

PropertyDef.name: InitialAlt
PropertyDef.descr: Approach altitude Feet AGL

PropertyDef.name: PassOncoming
PropertyDef.descr: Allow passing by oncoming traffic on the right

PropertyDef.name: MaxBank
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum bank used when turning between waypoints in degrees

PropertyDef.name: WaypointTouchDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance in meters at which Aircraft AI considers waypoint to be reached.

PropertyDef.name: AssignedHeading
PropertyDef.descr: in true degrees

PropertyDef.name: AssignedAltitude
PropertyDef.descr: meters MSL

PropertyDef.name: DoTouchAndGoes
PropertyDef.descr: Do touch and goes at the destination airport

PropertyDef.name: WakeTime
PropertyDef.descr: World Time when we should wake up (not a countdown).

PropertyDef.name: SleepTime
PropertyDef.descr: World Time when we should go to sleep (not a countdown).

PropertyDef.name: RepeatPeriod
PropertyDef.descr: Period, in seconds, of the schedule. 0 means doesn't repeat

PropertyDef.name: CurrentItem
PropertyDef.descr: Current item in the schedule.

PropertyDef.name: Playing
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not the recorded flight is being played back by the PlayFlightRecordingAction or not

PropertyDef.name: TimeStamp
PropertyDef.descr: Time offset of playback when saved

PropertyDef.name: TimeStampEnd
PropertyDef.descr: The ending time of playback when saved

PropertyDef.name: WaypointListReference
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the referenced WaypointList Object. Use the Waypoints editor to modify this field.

SetDef.name: Waypoint
SetDef.descr: A waypoint contains navigational information including a position as well as extra directives that an object following the waypoint can choose to obey (e.g. speed).

SetDef.name: OnWaypointReachedActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when the waypoint controller reaches a waypoint. Only the Mobile Scenery Object Controller and Placement Object Controller support this currently.

SetDef.name: OnWaypointListCompleteActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when the waypoint controller reaches the last waypoint in the waypoint list. If WrapWaypoints is True, then this will fire each time the controller reaches the last waypoint in the waypoint list. Only the Mobile Scenery Object Controller and Placement Object Controller support this currently.

SetDef.name: ActivateWaypointsAction
SetDef.descr: Waypoints are essential to command the movement of several different types of objects. The activate waypoints action provides a way to assign these objects a new list of waypoints or cancel objects following existing waypoints.

SetDef.name: Container
SetDef.descr: Entities are vehicles that you can add to your mission and customize with waypoints, AI behaviors, etc.

SetDef.name: PlacementObjectController
SetDef.descr: Advanced waypoint following controller for PlacementObjects

SetDef.name: PlacementObject
SetDef.descr: Object with a position and an orientation with an optional controller that supports advanced waypoint path following.
